comments.body: The XML documentation closing tag has an extra '>' (e.g. "</summary>>"). Remove the extra character to comply with proper XML syntax.

The loop condition in the SetNewPosition method appears flawed. The condition uses 'mouseY > y + EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2' where it likely should be 'mouseY > y - EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2', otherwise the button repositioning logic might not work as intended.
The private field 'escapeDistance' does not follow typical naming conventions for private members. Consider renaming it to '_escapeDistance' for better clarity and adherence to C# style guidelines.
